issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Hi,

I have a customer who is experiencing frequent crashes with our application - one of two components seem to be causing the problem:

WebKit.dll (a separate ticket has been opened for this)
JavaScriptCore.dll

The JavascriptCore.dll version bundled with RC2 is v5.33.0.0 - is it possible to either:

1) bundle the latest WebKit.dll with Desktop 1.2.0, or
2) for me to manually bundle the latest version with our application - if so, how?

Thanks,

Paul.
fields.summary: XYZ.exe stopped working Fault Module Name: JavascriptCore.dll
fields.environment: Windows Vista 32 Bit, titanium Desktop 1.2.0 RC2

comments.body:
Paul

The way you have described this problem, and the (lack of) information you have included, means that it should be raised in the helpdesk or Q&A. If you post the links to either of these back in this ticket, I will ask the team responsible to take a look.

Thanks
